name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revi.AI — check grammar and improve text using AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that improves the quality of your text using ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is essential for anyone who frequently works with text on the web or in apps and needs quick access to text revisions—whether you're a native speaker of the language or not.

It helps correct grammar mistakes, typos, and syntax, ensuring that your text is well-structured.

The extension works instantly. You can activate it with a hotkey or select text on a page to immediately get a revised version copied to your clipboard. You can also input text by voice for revision or translation.

For those curious about why certain changes were made, the Explain Revision feature offers detailed insights.

Powered by ChatGPT models, it delivers exceptional results every time you revise your text.

With this extension, you can: 
• Instantly improve the quality of your text, ensuring every word is polished. 
• Get revisions in English, Spanish, German, French, Russian, Chinese, Arabic, and Japanese. 
• Access detailed explanations for revised texts. 
• Use your microphone to request a revision instead of typing. 
• Easily navigate and utilize the extension's features with hotkeys.
